messages.subject: If finally happened
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/15/03 11:01:18 AM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/15/03 11:01:18 AM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< You can send a copy to the state later if they say "We don't have your
registration."
You say "Oh. Sorry. Here's a copy." >>

Yeah, and I panicked and actually sent the original, notorized form into the
umbrella school. I don't think they are the least bit interested in checking
up on me. He only asked me to fax a copy for our records so he wouldn't have
to bug me if a "nosy neighbor" called in again.
So he acted like it was more for us than for the school district, who knows.
I really think just the notorized copy would satisfy, but now I'm officially
registered.
Dang!

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
